subject: Attention
body:
Attention
SCAM VICITIMS
During police intervention at the G20 summit last December in Hamburg.
This was announced by the Interior Ministry of the state in Dusseldorf
at the request of the German Press Agency. It was alarmed so much by
world leaders about the numbers of complain been received each day in
their countries by their citizen about African. This includes victims
of purported foreign contracts; Inheritance, Investment, Dating and
Lottery scams together with people that allegedly had unfinished
transaction or international Lottery payment that failed due to
purported Government policies etc.
 Your email was among the list of
victims submitted to our office by the United States Fraud
investigation Department and final investigation by our secret agents
who has been monitoring your correspondence via special tracking
device has shown that you are truly a victim of scam and qualify to
receive the scam victims compensation payment.
America President Joe Biden which is desperately needed for our
National Defense, is very annoyed reasons is because his country
Citizen where the most hit by these scam artist. So he has instructed
all African head of states/presidents of African countries to make
sure that all foreign payments in Africa is paid to the rightful owner
before the end of 2023.
According to Joe Biden some of Victims have spent a lot of money and
still they have not received their fund. So all African Leaders in
conjunction with United Nations and G20 is compensating all the
Victims with the sum of $936,000 dollars United State Dollars because
of what has happened to them in the past. President Joe Biden has
warned that 
failure to comply with this instruction, The Country will
lose all the Grant they have been enjoying from United Nations, United
States of America and other G20 Countries.
Thanks
Email: 
honjusticeokorowo@gmx.com
My Regards to your Family
HON. JUSTICE A.O. OKOROWO.
Attorney Counsels At Law
Freedom Chambers Justice High Court

subject: Re: Attention
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It's quite alarming to hear about the number of scam victims worldwide. I'm glad that measures are being taken to address this issue.

Could you please elaborate more on how the tracking device works? And how was my email identified as one of the victims?

Also, it's interesting to know about President Joe Biden's involvement in this matter. Could you provide more details on his instructions to African heads of states?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Virginia
